instructions.name: add_liquidity_v2
docs: Adds liquidity to multiple bins using BinArray architecture.
# V2 Features
- Snapshots fee growth before deposit (prevents front-running)
- Validates vault balance increases match expected amounts
- Post-deposit accounting validation
- Auto-compounding fee tracking initialized
# Usage
Can deposit into bins across multiple BinArrays in a single transaction.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool (zero-copy).

accounts.name: owner
docs: Position owner (signs).

accounts.name: owner_base
docs: Owner's base token account.

accounts.name: owner_quote
docs: Owner's quote token account.

accounts.name: base_vault
docs: Pool's base vault.

accounts.name: quote_vault
docs: Pool's quote vault.

accounts.name: position
docs: Position PDA.

instructions.name: claim_protocol_fees
docs: Claims protocol fees from fee vaults.

accounts.name: creator_destination
docs: Where creator fees are finally sent (pool creator, DAO treasury, etc.)

accounts.name: holders_destination
docs: Aggregator / distributor for token holders rewards

accounts.name: nft_destination
docs: Aggregator / distributor for NFT holders rewards

instructions.name: close_all
docs: BREAK-GLASS: Emergency close-all for a single pool (admin only).

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool PDA (seeded from instruction args)

accounts.name: registry
docs: Registry PDA (so you can re-init same pair after closing)

instructions.name: close_pool
docs: Closes pool (admin only).

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool PDA (seeded from instruction args)

accounts.name: registry
docs: Registry PDA (close too so you can re-init same pair)

instructions.name: create_bin_array
docs: Creates a new BinArray account (holds 64 consecutive bins).
# V2 Architecture
BinArrays batch 64 bins into a single account for gas efficiency.
# Arguments
* `lower_bin_index` - Starting bin index (must be multiple of 64)
# Example
- lower_bin_index=128 → creates array covering bins 128-191
- lower_bin_index=0 → creates array covering bins 0-63
- lower_bin_index=-64 → creates array covering bins -64 to -1

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool that owns this bin array.

accounts.name: admin
docs: Pool admin (must sign to create bins).

accounts.name: bin_array
docs: New BinArray account to initialize.
Seeds: ["bin_array", pool, lower_bin_index_le]
lower_bin_index must be aligned to 64-bin boundaries (0, 64, 128, -64, etc.)

instructions.name: init_pool
docs: Initializes a new liquidity pool (state + lp_mint + registry).

accounts.name: admin
docs: Pays for initialization, becomes pool admin (can be rotated later).

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool state account (PDA), zero_copy for stack efficiency.

accounts.name: registry
docs: Pair registry PDA to prevent duplicate pools.

instructions.name: init_pool_vaults
docs: Initializes the pool’s vault token accounts and writes them into Pool.

accounts.name: admin
docs: Payer for account creations

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool PDA (already initialized by `init_pool`)

accounts.name: base_mint_account
docs: Mint accounts (Anchor will deserialize + owner-check)

instructions.name: init_position
docs: init a liquidity position single OR 2-sided

instructions.name: init_position_bin
docs: Initializes a PositionBin account binding a Position to a specific LiquidityBin.
This is usually called once per bin you want to deposit into (or created lazily).

accounts.name: position
docs: Position PDA (canonical seeds), ensures owner & pool binding

accounts.name: position_bin
docs: PositionBin PDA (canonical)

instructions.name: lock_liquidity
docs: Locks liquidity metadata.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool state (PDA) - validated in function body

accounts.name: liquidity_lock
docs: Per-user lock record (PDA) - manually initialized

accounts.name: user
docs: User who owns the lock record

accounts.name: user_lp
docs: User LP account to validate they have enough tokens and transfer from

accounts.name: escrow_lp
docs: Escrow account owned by pool PDA to hold locked LP tokens

instructions.name: set_pause
docs: Pauses or unpauses the pool.

instructions.name: set_pause_bits
docs: Sets pause bits for the pool (pause_guardian only).

instructions.name: swap_v2
docs: Executes a swap using BinArray architecture with accounting validation.
# V2 Features
- Traverses bins across multiple BinArrays efficiently
- Updates fee growth on each bin touched (auto-compounding)
- Post-swap validation: sum(bin_reserves) == vault_balances
- Fails transaction if accounting drift detected
# Security
Stricter than legacy swap - fails loud on accounting errors.

accounts.name: user_source
docs: User's source token account (validated in function)

accounts.name: user_destination
docs: User's destination token account (validated in function)

accounts.name: base_vault
docs: Pool's base vault (validated in function)

accounts.name: quote_vault
docs: Pool's quote vault (validated in function)

accounts.name: creator_fee_vault
docs: Creator fee vault (validated in function)

accounts.name: holders_fee_vault
docs: Holders fee vault (validated in function)

accounts.name: nft_fee_vault
docs: NFT fee vault (validated in function)

instructions.name: unlock_liquidity
docs: Unlock liquidity (if you implemented lock/unlock with escrow).

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool state (PDA)

accounts.name: liquidity_lock
docs: Per-user liquidity lock PDA

accounts.name: user
docs: User who owns the lock

accounts.name: user_lp
docs: User LP account to receive unlocked tokens

accounts.name: escrow_lp
docs: Escrow LP account owned by pool PDA

instructions.name: update_admin
docs: Updates the pool admin (admin only).

instructions.name: update_authorities
docs: Updates pool authorities (admin only).

instructions.name: update_fee_config
docs: Updates the pool fee configuration.

instructions.name: withdraw_v2
docs: Withdraws liquidity from multiple bins with auto-compounded fee distribution.
# V2 Features
- Calculates accrued fees: (current_fee_growth - initial_fee_growth) * shares
- Distributes fees automatically (no separate claim needed)
- Validates vault balance decreases match expected amounts
- Post-withdrawal accounting validation
- Completeness check: all relevant bins must be included
# Fee Distribution
Fees are auto-compounded - withdrawal includes proportional share of all fees
earned since deposit. No separate claiming required.

errors.msg: The swap operation did not meet the minimum output requirements due to slippage protection.

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: The pool does not have sufficient liquidity to perform this operation.

errors.name: UnauthorizedOperation
errors.msg: Unauthorized operation attempted.

errors.name: InvalidAuthority

errors.msg: The account state is invalid.

errors.msg: Token transfer failed to execute correctly.

errors.name: PoolPaused

errors.name: OperationDisabled
errors.msg: The requested operation is currently disabled.

errors.name: MigrationFailed
errors.msg: Migration failed for this pool account.

errors.name: VersionMismatch

errors.msg: Liquidity bin already exists for this index.

errors.msg: Liquidity bin not found for the requested index.

errors.name: InvalidBinBounds
errors.msg: Invalid liquidity bin bounds.

errors.name: LPTokenMismatch

errors.name: NotEnoughShares

errors.name: LPVaultMismatch
errors.msg: LP vault or escrow does not match expected authority.

errors.name: PriceOutOfRange

errors.name: PoolNotEmpty
errors.msg: Pool reserves must be empty on bootstrap

errors.name: InvalidVaultOwner
errors.msg: Vault is not owned by the SPL Token program

errors.name: InvalidVaultAuthority

errors.name: DuplicateBinIndex

errors.name: PositionPoolMismatch

types.name: AdminUpdated
docs: Emitted when the admin rotates to a new key.

types.name: AuthoritiesUpdated
docs: Emitted when auxiliary authorities are updated.

types.name: BinArray
docs: BinArray account holding BIN_ARRAY_SIZE (64) consecutive bins.
Bins are indexed as: bin_index = lower_bin_index + array_offset (0..63)
PDA Derivation:
seeds = [b"bin_array", pool.key(), lower_bin_index.to_le_bytes()]
lower_bin_index is always aligned to BIN_ARRAY_SIZE boundaries:
lower_bin_index = (actual_bin_index / 64) * 64
Example: bin indices 128-191 are stored in BinArray with lower_bin_index=128
Field order optimized to avoid padding (bins placed first after pool for proper alignment)

fields.name: pool
docs: Owning pool.

fields.name: bins
docs: Packed bins (64 consecutive bins). Must be 16-byte aligned.

fields.name: lower_bin_index
docs: Starting bin index for this array (always multiple of BIN_ARRAY_SIZE).

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for 16-byte alignment (u128 fields require struct to be 16-byte aligned).

types.name: BinArrayCreated
docs: Event emitted when a new BinArray is created.

types.name: BinLiquidityDeposit
docs: Per-bin liquidity deposit specification.

fields.name: bin_index
docs: Bin index (canonically encoded)

fields.name: base_in
docs: Base tokens to deposit

fields.name: quote_in
docs: Quote tokens to deposit

fields.name: min_shares_out
docs: Minimum shares expected (slippage protection)

types.name: BinLiquidityUpdated
docs: Emitted whenever a bin’s reserves change (e.g., deposit or swap traversal).

fields.name: delta_base
docs: Change in base/quote reserve (unsigned magnitudes).

fields.name: reserve_base
docs: Resulting reserves after the change.

types.name: BinWithdrawal
docs: Per-bin withdrawal specification.

fields.name: bin_index
docs: Bin index (canonically encoded)

fields.name: shares
docs: Shares to burn from this bin

fields.name: finalize
docs: When false: sweep tokens + close bins passed in remaining_accounts.
When true: also closes vault token accounts + registry + pool.

types.name: CompactBin
docs: Compact bin data stored within a BinArray.
bin_index is implicitly derived as: lower_bin_index + offset

fields.name: reserve_base
docs: Actual token reserves at this bin's fixed price.

fields.name: total_shares
docs: Total bin shares outstanding across all positions.

fields.name: fee_growth_base_q128
docs: Cumulative fee growth per unit of share in Q128 fixed-point.
Used for auto-compounding fee distribution to position holders.
Updated on every swap that touches this bin.

types.name: FeeConfig
docs: Fee distribution configuration for the pool.

types.name: FeeConfigUpdated
docs: Emitted whenever the fee configuration is changed.

types.name: FeesDistributed
docs: Emitted when fees are split to fee vaults during swap.

types.name: LiquidityBinCreated
docs: Emitted when a new liquidity bin is created.

fields.name: initial_total_shares
docs: Initial bin share supply (position-bin accounting).

types.name: LiquidityDeposited
docs: Emitted when a user deposits liquidity and receives LP shares.

fields.name: shares_minted
docs: LP shares minted to the user (LP mint decimals, typically 9).

types.name: LiquidityLock
docs: Liquidity lock account.

types.name: LiquidityLocked
docs: Emitted when a user locks liquidity (book-entry in current code).

types.name: LiquidityWithdrawnAdmin
docs: Emitted when an admin performs a legacy/admin-only withdrawal.

types.name: LiquidityWithdrawnUser
docs: Emitted when a user withdraws by burning LP shares.

types.name: PairRegistered
docs: Emitted if you keep a separate register_pair instruction (factory/registry path).

types.name: PairRegistry
docs: Pair registry to prevent duplicate pools beyond canonical ordering.
PDA seeds: [b"registry", base_mint, quote_mint] (where base_mint < quote_mint)

fields.name: base_mint
docs: Canonical pair (base < quote)

fields.name: pool
docs: Pool address created for this pair.

fields.name: bin_step_bps
docs: Bin step used by this pool (bps).

fields.name: created_at
docs: Creation timestamp.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed.

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for future config (e.g., flags).

types.name: PauseUpdated
docs: Emitted when pause bitmask changes.

fields.name: paused
docs: Bitmask of paused features (see state/flags.rs):
PAUSE_SWAP | PAUSE_DEPOSIT | PAUSE_WITHDRAW

types.name: Pool
docs: Main pool account holding configuration, authorities, price cache and vaults.
Fields are ordered to minimize padding for zero-copy compatibility.
Using unsafe Pod/Zeroable impl because #[repr(C)] may add minimal padding
between fields of different alignments, but all fields are Pod-compatible.

fields.name: accounting_mode
docs: Accounting mode:
0 = legacy global LP shares
1 = position-bin shares

types.name: PoolInitialized
docs: Emitted once when a pool is initialized.

types.name: Position
docs: A Position represents *ownership authority* in a pool.
It does NOT store liquidity. All accounting is per-bin in PositionBin.
PDA seeds (canonical):
[POSITION_SEED, pool, owner, nonce_le]

fields.name: pool
docs: Owning pool

fields.name: owner
docs: Owner of this position

fields.name: nonce
docs: Optional user-defined nonce to allow multiple positions per pool

fields.name: created_at
docs: Creation timestamp

fields.name: last_updated
docs: Last updated timestamp

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for future use (alignment + upgrades)

types.name: PositionBin
docs: A PositionBin represents how many bin-shares
a specific Position owns in a specific LiquidityBin.
PDA seeds (canonical):
[POSITION_BIN_SEED, position, bin_index_le]

fields.name: position
docs: Parent position

fields.name: pool
docs: Owning pool (redundant but useful for validation)

fields.name: bin_index
docs: Bin index this position participates in

fields.name: shares
docs: Bin shares owned by this position.
These are claims on LiquidityBin reserves via:
amount_out = reserves * shares_burn / total_shares

fields.name: fee_growth_base_q128
docs: Accrued fees (optional, future use)

fields.name: last_updated
docs: Last update timestamp

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for upgrades / alignment

types.name: RewardIndexes
docs: Tracks accumulated reward indexes for holders and NFT stakers.

types.name: SwapExecuted
docs: Emitted on each swap execution.

fields.name: total_fee
docs: Total fee charged (token domain depends on direction; commonly quote).

fields.name: price_after_q64_64
docs: Post-swap price marker in Q64.64.

types.name: SwapRouteV2
docs: Swap route specifying bin indices to traverse.
For BinArray architecture, bins can span multiple arrays.

fields.name: bin_indices
docs: Ordered bin indices (best price → worst price)
